description: Dashboard providing insight to Prometheus monitoring system status and it's runtime info.

styles.linkTooltip: Link to git branch of a build
Link to git commit of a build

panels.title: Build, uptime and runtime instance info
$quantile quantile of interval length between scrapes per job

$quantile quantile of request size by handler
Number of concurent queries and it's limit
$quantile quantile of query engine evaluation duration per slice
Number of queries on remote read API
